name: Resquare: Fill The Grid
description:
Resquare is a fun and addictive puzzle game. The goal is to fill the gray squares by sliding the orange block.
Resquare comes with 5 game stages and 50 levels. You can challenge yourself in challenge or choose to just lay back and relax while solving your puzzles.

Features:
- 50 levels
- Easy to play
- Colorful characters
- Stones and teleports
- Squared elements and board
